entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
